strategy: Steel Legion armies have a stratergy rating of 2.
initiative: All formations have a initiative rating of 2+. All Imerial Titans have an initiative rating 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Armageddon Steel Legion Regiment

formations.name: 0–1 Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Supreme Commander unit, twelve Infantry units and seven Chimera

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: One Commander unit, twelve Infantry units and seven Chimera

formations.name: Infantry Company
formations.units: One Commander unit and twelve Infantry units

formations.name: Tank Company
formations.units: Nine Leman Russ Tanks and One Vanquisher

formations.name: Super-heavy Tank Company
formations.units: Three Baneblades or Shadowswords in any combination

formations.name: Artillery Company
formations.units: Nine Basilisk or nine Manticore and nine gun emlpacements.
upgrades: *Only the Flak Upgrade may be added to a Artillery Company.

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to a Two Support Formations for each Core Formation.

formations.name: 0–1 Deathstrike Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Artillery Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Bombard Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Flak Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Super-heavy Tank Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Shadowsword, Stormsword or Stormblade

formations.name: Tempestus Scions
formations.units: Eight Tempestus Scions and One Tempestor
upgrades: Add 4 Taurox OR Add 4 Valkyries +150 points

sections.name: Steel Legion Aircraft, Spacecraft
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Heavy Support, Aircraft and Spacecraft

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
upgrades: Replace with Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points

upgrades.title: Steel Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per Formation with the exception of valkyries and vendetta upgrades.

options.description: Add three Leman Russ or Leman Russ Demolishers
Replace a Commissar with a Lord Commissar.
* These upgrades may add Chimeras. All infantry units in the formation must be transported in Chimeras and the minimum chimeras are to be taken.
